comment: Upon first reading about this whole situation, I thought and said to my significant other, "Wow, I can't believe Johnny Depp's legal advisors would tell him that going to court with this is a good idea!" As it turns out, it's very clear why they've gone this route. I'm glad I started seeking more info at that point; had I accepted at face value the allegations, I would have forever held the flawed conclusion that JD was a dirtbag.

You know, it really irritates me that a LOT of women flocked to her defense and believed her!
